# What is Pre-Registration?

class: onecol

## Pre-Registration Basics

Pre-registrations are ![:emphasize](time-stamped research plans) that are typically created **before** starting data collection<sup>1</sup>. 

.footnote[
[1] However, there are preregistration templates available for secondary data collection.
]

--

There are many templates available on the [Open Science Framework](https://osf.io/zab38/wiki/home/); they vary in specificity/length but typically include: 
- Study information
- Specific hypotheses
- Methods (inclusion/exclusion criteria, variables collected, sample size)
- Specific analysis plan
- Whether data collection has begun (and if so, whether you have looked at the data)

--

Note: **clinical trials** have specific requirements (dictated by government, funding agencies, etc).
